title: Email/Password Authentication Success
description: Verify user can sign up and sign in using valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign up page.
Enter valid name, email, and password with at least 8 characters.
Submit sign up form.
Verify account creation is successful with user data returned.
Sign out if signed in automatically.
Navigate to the sign in page.
Enter valid email and password.
Submit sign in form.
Verify user is signed in and authenticated with valid session token.

title: Authentication Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify sign in fails with incorrect password and appropriate error is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign in page.
Enter valid email and incorrect password.
Submit sign in form.
Verify sign in fails and error feedback is displayed indicating invalid credentials.

title: Third-Party Authentication Providers Support
description: Verify users can authenticate successfully using Google, Apple, and GitHub providers.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign in page.
Choose Google authentication.
Verify Google OAuth flow completes and user is signed in.
Sign out.
Choose Apple authentication.
Verify Apple OAuth flow completes and user is signed in.
Sign out.
Choose GitHub authentication.
Verify GitHub OAuth flow completes and user is signed in.

title: CEFR-Based Lesson Progression
description: Verify lessons are delivered according to selected CEFR level and user unlocks higher levels sequentially.

steps.description: Select language and initial CEFR level A1.
Fetch lessons for level A1.
Validate lessons correspond to A1 level according to API response.
Complete all A1 lessons.
Attempt to access A2 lessons.
Verify A2 lessons are unlocked only after completing A1.
Progress through subsequent levels B1, B2, C1, and C2 similarly.
Verify lesson delivery aligns with user CEFR progression and access restrictions.

title: Exercise Types Functionality and Validation
description: Verify various exercise types (flashcard, multiple choice, fill in the blank, listening, speaking) behave correctly including correct answer validation.

steps.description: Start a lesson containing all exercise types.
For flashcard exercises, flip cards and verify content visibility.
Flashcard shows expected question and answer.
For multiple choice exercises, select correct and incorrect options.
Correct answers are accepted; incorrect answers prompt retry or feedback.
For fill in the blank exercises, enter correct and incorrect answers.
System validates input and provides appropriate feedback.
For listening exercises, play audio and answer questions accordingly.
Audio plays correctly; answers validated properly.
For speaking exercises, provide voice input.
Speech recognition converts voice accurately and evaluates correctness.

title: XP, Hearts, Streaks and Achievements Tracking
description: Verify that XP is awarded properly, streaks increment correctly, hearts are decremented on failures, and achievements unlock appropriately based on user progress.

steps.description: Complete a lesson successfully.
XP increases by lesson indicated xpReward value.
Complete consecutive days of lessons to build streak.
Streak count increments correctly per day.
Fail an exercise that consumes a heart.
Number of hearts decreases by one.
Achieve predefined milestones to unlock achievements.
Achievements appear unlocked in user profile and gamification state.

title: Offline Learning and Data Synchronization
description: Verify user can access lessons offline, make progress offline, and synchronization with cloud occurs correctly when back online, no data loss occurs.

steps.description: Switch user device to offline mode.
Access available lessons and complete exercises offline.
Lessons and exercises load correctly from local SQLite storage.
Complete lessons and record XP and progress offline.
Switch device back online.
Trigger data synchronization manually or wait for automatic sync.
Offline progress, XP, hearts, and streak data sync correctly with Firebase Firestore without data loss or duplication.

title: Speech Recognition Accuracy and Feedback
description: Verify speech-to-text converts user speech input accurately and provides realtime feedback for pronunciation practice including confidence scoring.

steps.description: Start a speaking exercise requiring user to say a word or phrase.
Speak the phrase clearly in the target language.
Recognized text matches expected phrase with high confidence.
Pronunciation feedback component displays correct information based on confidence.
Speak incorrectly or unclearly.
System detects mismatch and provides appropriate corrective feedback.

title: Text-To-Speech Synthesis for Listening Exercises
description: Verify text-to-speech API generates audio correctly for given text and chosen language and voice, plays audio during listening exercises.

steps.description: Start a listening exercise with synthesized speech.
Trigger playing of synthesized audio.
Audio file URL is returned from synthesis endpoint.
Audio plays without issues and voice matches selected language and voice settings.

title: Multi-language Content Rendering
description: Verify application supports content rendering and interaction in all six supported languages including English, Spanish, French, Italian, Croatian, and Chinese.

steps.description: Set main language and target language to each of the six supported languages sequentially.
Load lessons and content for each language pairing.
Verify UI text, lesson content, and vocabulary display correctly in selected languages.
Verify glyphs, accents, and special characters display without encoding issues.
Verify text input fields accept appropriate characters for language.

title: Error Reporting and Handling on API Failures
description: Verify application properly handles API errors, reports errors using centralized error service, and displays user-friendly error feedback.

steps.description: Simulate backend API failures for authentication, lessons, or gamification endpoints.
Verify errors are caught by centralized error service.
Verify error details including stack trace and context are reported to error analytics dashboard.
Verify user is shown appropriate error messages without app crash.

title: Performance Monitoring and Responsive UI under Load
description: Validate backend API responsiveness and scalability; verify UI remains responsive and user receives timely feedback under normal and peak loads.

steps.description: Generate load test traffic simulating multiple concurrent users calling key endpoints.
Verify API response times are within SLA limits with no critical errors.
Use application UI to perform normal user flows during peak load.
Verify UI updates reliably and promptly; no timeouts or freezes occur.
Verify performance metrics appear correctly in analytics dashboard.

title: User Data Backup Creation
description: Verify user can initiate data backup successfully and backup is stored and accessible.

steps.description: Trigger data backup process via settings or automated flow.
Backup creation endpoint returns success.
Backup data is accessible and contains expected user progress and settings.

title: Language Settings Update
description: Verify user can update main and target languages and preferences for translations and phonetics, and settings persist correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to language settings.
Change main language, target language, toggle translation and phonetic display options.
Save updated language settings.
Verify backend API accepts and saves the settings without error.
Verify application reflects updated language preferences immediately or on next load.
